trans-unit.source: Authenticates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenner en <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref> sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: Override the UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator class to authenticate security tokens based on a user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator klassen for å godkjenne sikkerhetstokener basert på et brukernavn og passord.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] ships with the following classes that provide support for authenticating <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] leveres med følgende klasser som gir støtte for å godkjenne <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>sikkerhetstokener.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: |Type|Description| |----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>|Allows an application to provide a custom authentication scheme for user names and passwords.
trans-unit.target: | Typen | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>| Tillater at et program for å angi en egendefinert godkjenningsskjemaet for brukernavn og passord.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: The authentication scheme is provided using a class deriving from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> class.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>|Authenticates the user name and password as a Windows account.| Most custom authentication schemes can use the use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> class and implement a class that derives from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenningsskjemaet angis ved hjelp av en klasse som er avledet fra klassen <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>. | | <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>| Godkjenner brukernavn og passord som en Windows-konto. | De fleste egendefinerte godkjenningsvalg kan bruke Bruk <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>klassen og Implementer en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>klassen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>

trans-unit.source: However, if additional flexibility is needed, you can derive a class from the UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator class and override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det trengs flere fleksibilitet, du kan avledes en klasse fra klassen UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator og overstyre den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den angitte sikkerhetskode kan valideres av denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: The CanValidateTokenCore method does not authenticate the security token; that is performed by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CanValidateTokenCore godkjenne ikke sikkerhetstokenet; som utføres av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: when token is a security token; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: when token is a security token; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenner angitte sikkerhetstokenet, og returnerer settet med godkjenning policyer for sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateTokenCore method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> method to authenticate the `token` parameter using its user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall ValidateTokenCore den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A>metoden for å godkjenne den `token` parameter ved å bruke den brukernavn og passord.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> som inneholder settet med godkjenning policyer som gjelder for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, authenticates the specified user name and password and returns the set of authorization policies for <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, godkjenner angitt brukernavn og passord og returnerer settet med godkjenning policyer for <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref> sikkerhetstokener.

trans-unit.source: Override the ValidateUserNamePasswordCore method to authenticate <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr ValidateUserNamePasswordCore-metoden til å godkjenne <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>sikkerhetstokener.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: When the ValidateUserNamePasswordCore method is overridden, follow these guidelines: - When the security token passed into the `token` parameter cannot be validated, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden ValidateUserNamePasswordCore overstyres, følger du retningslinjene: – når sikkerhetstokenet som ble sendt til den `token` parameteren kan ikke validere, Iverksett den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>

trans-unit.source: - When there are no authorization policies in effect for this application, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.
trans-unit.target: -Når det finnes ingen godkjenning policyer som gjelder for dette programmet, returneres en tom <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>av typen <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: When `null` is returned by this method, [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] throws the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når `null` returneres av denne metoden [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] oppstår det <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>

trans-unit.source: The user name associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: Navnet som er forbundet med sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: The password associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: Passordet som er forbundet med sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> som inneholder settet med godkjenning policyer som gjelder for dette programmet.
